msg: Fix for HADOOP-40.  Buffer position was not maintained correctly.  Contributed by Konstantin Shvachko.

author: mrglavas
msg: Increasing visibility of DOM setOwnerDocument() methods from package private to protected.
Increasing visibility of HTMLElementImpl constructor from package private to public.
These changes have been made on request from Jacob Kjome.
